#3 Application of stan
```{r}
suppressWarnings(library(rstan))
```

```{r}
modelString = "
  data {
    int<lower=0> N ;
    int y[N] ; //length-N vector of integers 
  }
  parameters {
    real<lower=0,upper=1> theta ;
  }
  model {
    theta ~ beta(1,1) ;
    y ~ bernoulli(theta) ; 
  }
"
stanDso <- stan_model( model_code=modelString ) 
```
